body_html:
This looks like it can work for me.... only problem is

  1. This compiles for python 2.7, I think I can get by but ideally would want to get a python 3.5 version

to fix that I think I would need some time to modify this file in master branch to give it /usr/bin/python3 instead of the default 2.x

tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pi/build_raspberry_pi.sh

...
# Make sure you have an up to date version of the Bazel build tool installed too.

yes '' | ./configure # I'll need to change this I'd imagine
...
  1. the scripts cited in that blog post are not in the r1.3 branch.. so I am guessing they're not really released yet. adding these instructions then would not make sense for 1.3 branch

body:
This looks like it can work for me.... only problem is 

1) This compiles for python 2.7, I think I can get by but ideally would want to get a python 3.5 version

to fix that I think I would need some time to modify this file in `master` branch to give it `/usr/bin/python3` instead of the default 2.x

```
tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pi/build_raspberry_pi.sh

...
# Make sure you have an up to date version of the Bazel build tool installed too.

yes '' | ./configure # I'll need to change this I'd imagine
...
```

2) the scripts cited in that blog post are not in the `r1.3` branch.. so I am guessing they're not really released yet.  adding these instructions then would not make sense for 1.3 branch
